init.title: Welcome
init.intro: My open source blog is served on Debian using Nginx and Harp.

jeld-wen.title: JELD-WEN
jeld-wen.intro: Numerous Javascript and PHP MVC components, written in the finest Joomla adherent AJAX fashion.

cagehost.title: CageHost
cagehost.intro: Automated provisioning and billing for cPanel shared hosting, and virtual servers with dedicated resources.

justmakegames.title: Just Make Games
justmakegames.intro: What began as a school club became a game development social network with over 2,000 active members and 400,000 YouTube views, with tutorials, reviews, points and prizes.

footable.title: FooTable Pagination Plugin
footable.intro: I fell in love with these dynamic, responsive tables so much that I added pagination.

fbignite.title: Facebook Ignite
fbignite.intro: Design UI and develop protoype for Facebook open source development training courses.

acelogin.title: Ace Login / Register
acelogin.intro: Ace Login Register combines the native login and registration functionality of Joomla into one slick module!

harp-blog.title: My Harp Blog
harp-blog.intro: This open source site, served with just Nginx and Harp, built with the Foundation responsive framework, was my first foray into flat file minimalism. It worked magically.

steam-debian-jessie.intro: It used to be hard, but
